name: Bugzilla.mozilla.org but Github inspired
description:
A cleaner default theme for Bugzilla.mozilla.org with style changes inspired by Github. 
You need to have "Use modal user interface" set to ON (default value) in your Bugzilla preferences.
additional_info:
V2.5: 2019-04-05
- minor adjustments for the new 'Regressed By' and 'Type' fields

V2.4: 2019-01-24
- bug fixes caused by upstream changes
- needinfo mention is in orange

V2.3: 2018-11-08
- bug fixes
- improvements to bug list views

V2.4: 2018-11-08
- Bug lists are styled better (improvements)
- multiple glitches fixed on individual bug view
- user story section in bugs is now better styled

V2.3: 2018-11-02
- Bug lists are styled better

V2.2.1: 2018-10-31
- Fix broken scrolling of pages because of an upstream css change

V2.2: 2018-08-26
- Fira Sans become the default font
- Fixed white on white text in drop down menu at the top (regression from a bugzilla evolution)

V2.1: 2018-08-07
- Better emoji font fallback now that Bugzilla supports emoji
- Nicer separator for new comments since last visit
- Bugs with no assignee gets the unassigned field in red

V2.0: 2018-04-30
- update file attachment icon to be more visible
- 'File a bug' item in header is now green
- list of recipient emails on bug processed is now displayed as columns
- flatten most buttons

V1.9: 2018-04-16
- nicer styling of linked comment (ex: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1436048#c39)
- Notification badge is now like Github's
- use only one blue color for links and new bugs
- first pass at being more mobile friendly (very preliminary)

V1.8: 2018-04-09
- Github style header
- 'Add Comment' area now restyled
- Improved tracking flags table styling for readibility 
- Flattened action buttons in comments
- Unconfirmed bugs always have purple colour, question mark removed
- Use same fonts as Github
- Minor fixes to comments borders

V1.7: 2018-01-25
- Bug status colored according to resolution
- Save changes button is now styled as green

V1.6: 2018-01-16 
- bugs are now styled as tags.
- paper clip icon in front of Attach File link
- Hide useless user guide links
- reduce height of comment header
- fix button borders in header
- Some emphasis on the reporter name

V1.5: 2018-01-12 
- Use role is now below the avatar
- improved comment height
- Styles for attachments

V1.4: 2018-01-11
- code coverage + crashstop integration fixes
- alignments and color fixes

V1.3: 2018-01-10
- larger rounded gravatars

V1.2: 2018-01-10
- Save Edits now green everywhere
- alignment issues fixed
- select boxes aligned for flags
- compatibility with stop-crash extension

V1.1: 2018-01-10
 - Use sans-serif fonts  instead of monospace for comments and other font related changes

V1.0: 2018-01-09

I may or may not maintain this stylesheet over timeâ€¦
